channel.title: Staff capes playerrights
channel.description: i got a problem here i got staff capes and i want to make them for the staff positions only liek admin cape and mod cape and owner cape for their right player rights so i want to make owner cape for me only on my server how do i do that ive looked everywhere. any tutorial or anything

item.title: Staff capes playerrights
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

if(wearID == #### && playerRights >= 3) { //owner staffcape sM("you are wielding the owner staffcape!"); } else { sM("you need to be a owner to wield this cape!"); return false; }

Bad way to use. Takes up alot of space as more items are added. Here what to do:

Open item.java and add this:

public static final int[] staffItems = { ####, ####, ####, #### };

Then open client.java and search for:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Under that add this:

if(playerRights < 3) for(int i : Item.staffItems) if(wearID == i) { sM("You can't use this item!"); return false; }

Read full topic
